mapper.select: select pcname as champ, count(pcname) as count from play where puid=#{myid} group by pcname
select score, tier from myuser where id=#{myid}

select count(*) as cnt from ( select g.roomno as proomno, to_char(g.gdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as gdate, p.puid, p.pcname, p.piname, p.psname, p.kill, p.death, p.team, p.win from (select roomno, gdate from game )g join (select proomno, puid, pcname, piname, psname, kill, death, team, win from play where puid=#{myid} )p on g.roomno = p.proomno order by gdate desc )
